me dinawala widuliya araparissamen pawichchi karana lesa widuli bala ha balashakthi amathyanshaya mahajanathawagen illa siti.diwayine danata pawathina wiyali kalagunika thaththwaya nisa mahawali jala widuli balagara aashi්ratha jalashawala jala mattama pahala basa athayi da ee anuwa widulibala nipayuma da aduwi athayi da widulibala ha balashakthi amathyanshaya pawasayi.ee anuwa wiktoriya randenigala rantambae kothmale samanala athulu jala widuli balagarawalin nipadawu gigawot paya 1260 ka pamana widulibala dharithawa gigawot paya 400 dakwa aduwi atha.me anuwa niwasawala, widiwala widuli balaya araparissamen bhawitha karana lesa widulibala ha balashakthi amathyanshaya janathawagen illa siti.
